title: CR-091 Governance Failure: Code Not Propagated to Production Submodule

comment:
QA Pre-Review of INV-012 v0.1 — RECOMMEND

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: "CR-091 Governance Failure: Code Not Propagated to Production Submodule" — present and non-empty
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" — acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-002 Section 8 (executable documents are self-authorizing; CR ID not required for initial creation)

DOCUMENT STRUCTURE (per SOP-003 Section 5 / TEMPLATE-INV):
All 10 required sections present:
1. Purpose — present, clearly states the governance failure and triggering event
2. Scope — present with all required subsections (2.1 Context, 2.2 Deviation Type, 2.3 Systems/Documents Affected)
3. Background — present with all required subsections (3.1 Expected Behavior, 3.2 Actual Behavior, 3.3 Discovery, 3.4 Timeline)
4. Description of Deviation(s) — present (4.1-4.4, organized by deviation; each subsection includes facts, observations, and evidence as required by SOP-003 Section 5.4)
5. Impact Assessment — present (5.1 Systems, 5.2 Documents, 5.3 Other Impacts)
6. Root Cause Analysis — present (6.1 Contributing Factors, 6.2 Root Causes)
7. Remediation Plan (CAPAs) — present with three CAPAs in correct table format
8. Execution Comments — present with execution-phase placeholders
9. Execution Summary — present with execution-phase placeholder
10. References — present with all governing SOPs referenced

PLACEHOLDER VERIFICATION:
- Draft-phase placeholders ({{...}}): None found — all replaced with content. PASS
- Execution-phase placeholders ([...]): Present in Sections 7-9 as expected for pre-review. PASS
- No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. PASS

SOP REFERENCE ACCURACY (verified against effective SOPs):
- SOP-005 Section 7.1.3 (Merge Gate): Correctly characterized as covering merge prerequisites and merge type only, with no mention of submodule pointer updates. VERIFIED.
- SOP-006 Section 7.2 (Single Commit Requirement): Correctly quoted — "The qualified state must be demonstrable at a single git commit" and auditor verification language. VERIFIED.
- SOP-002 Section 7.3 (Post-Review Requirements): Correctly identified six conditions, none of which explicitly address submodule state verification. VERIFIED.
- SOP-005 Section 7.1.1 Workflow: Confirmed step 6 is "Merge to main" with no subsequent step for submodule pointer update in parent repository. VERIFIED.

ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS:
- Five contributing factors identified, each substantive and evidence-based
- Primary root cause (SOP-005 gap) and contributing root cause (SOP-002 checklist gap) are well-distinguished
- Correctly identifies these as procedural gaps rather than failures of judgment
- Analysis aligns with the evidence presented in Section 4

CAPA ALIGNMENT:
- CAPA-001 (Corrective): Addresses immediate code propagation and RTM baseline — aligned with Deviations 1 and 2
- CAPA-002 (Preventive): SOP-005 submodule workflow step — aligned with root cause (SOP-005 gap) and Deviation 4
- CAPA-003 (Preventive): SOP-002 QA checklist update — aligned with contributing root cause and Deviation 3
- CAPA types correctly classified per SOP-003 Section 6.1

FORMATTING AND CONSISTENCY:
- Section numbering sequential and correct (1-10)
- Table formatting consistent throughout
- No spelling or grammar errors found
- Markdown formatting (bold, code blocks, headers) consistent

FINDING: COMPLIANT. Document meets all pre-review requirements. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

QA Post-Review of INV-012 v1.1 — RECOMMEND

CAPA VERIFICATION (per SOP-003 Section 6.3-6.4):

SOP-003 Section 6.3 requires: "Verify during INV post-review that CAPA child CRs are referenced in the CAPA execution item and confirmed as closed."
SOP-003 Section 6.4 requires: "A CAPA must be verified as complete by having its child CR(s) referenced in the EI and confirmed as closed."

CAPA-001 (Corrective — Merge interaction system code to production):
- Child CR: CR-092 referenced in Implementation column. VERIFIED.
- CR-092 status: CLOSED at v2.0. VERIFIED via qms status.
- CR-092 title references parent: "INV-012 CAPA-1: ..." VERIFIED.
- Evidence: Submodule updated 2c6b826 -> c83dda0, qualified commit 7e708fc reachable, qms interact functional, VR CR-092-VR-001 attached, bug fix 532e630. VERIFIED.
- Outcome: Pass. Signature: claude - 2026-02-21. VERIFIED.

CAPA-002 (Preventive — Update SOP-005 submodule workflow):
- Child CR: CR-093 referenced in Implementation column. VERIFIED.
- CR-093 status: CLOSED at v2.0. VERIFIED via qms status.
- CR-093 title references parent: "INV-012 CAPA-2/3: ..." VERIFIED.
- Evidence: SOP-005 v6.0 EFFECTIVE — step 7 added to Section 7.1.1, submodule paragraph added to Section 7.1.3. VERIFIED.
- SOP-005 status: EFFECTIVE at v6.0. VERIFIED via qms status.
- Outcome: Pass. Signature: claude - 2026-02-21. VERIFIED.

CAPA-003 (Preventive — Update SOP-002 QA checklist):
- Child CR: CR-093 referenced in Implementation column (bundled with CAPA-002). VERIFIED.
- CR-093 status: CLOSED at v2.0. Already VERIFIED.
- Evidence: SOP-002 v14.0 EFFECTIVE — submodule state verification bullet added to Section 7.3. VERIFIED.
- SOP-002 status: EFFECTIVE at v14.0. VERIFIED via qms status.
- Outcome: Pass. Signature: claude - 2026-02-21. VERIFIED.

ALL THREE CAPAs COMPLETE. All child CRs referenced and confirmed CLOSED. All deliverables (SOP updates, submodule update) verified as EFFECTIVE/complete.

SOP-003 SECTION 8 CLOSURE CRITERIA PRE-CHECK:
- Root cause(s) identified: Yes (Section 6.2 — primary: SOP-005 gap; contributing: SOP-002 checklist gap). VERIFIED.
- All CAPAs complete (child CRs closed): CR-092 CLOSED, CR-093 CLOSED. VERIFIED.
- Evidence documented: Implementation column populated for all three CAPAs. VERIFIED.
- Post-review: This review. VERIFIED.

POST-REVIEW CHECKLIST (per SOP-002 Section 7.3):

1. EXECUTION COMPLETE: All 3 CAPAs show Outcome: Pass. No Fail outcomes. VERIFIED.
2. BLOCKING VARs: None created. N/A. VERIFIED.
3. VR-FLAGGED EIs: INV CAPA table does not use VR column structure; VRs attached at child CR level (CR-092-VR-001). N/A at INV level. VERIFIED.
4. CONTROLLED DOCUMENTS MODIFIED ARE EFFECTIVE:
   - SOP-005: EFFECTIVE at v6.0. VERIFIED.
   - SOP-002: EFFECTIVE at v14.0. VERIFIED.
5. REVISION_SUMMARY REQUIREMENTS:
   - SOP-005 v6.0: "CR-093: Add submodule pointer update step to Section 7.1.1 workflow and submodule guidance to Section 7.1.3 merge gate" — references CR-093. VERIFIED.
   - SOP-002 v14.0: "CR-093: Add submodule state verification to Section 7.3 QA post-review checklist" — references CR-093. VERIFIED.

PRE-APPROVED CONTENT INTEGRITY: Sections 1-6 unchanged from the pre-approved version reviewed and approved at v0.1/v1.0. VERIFIED.

EXECUTION-PHASE PLACEHOLDERS: All replaced with content. No [...] placeholders remaining. VERIFIED.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX found. VERIFIED.

EXECUTION COMMENTS: Three entries — CAPA bundling rationale, pre-existing bug documentation, EI-2 deviation. All appropriate and transparent. VERIFIED.

EXECUTION SUMMARY: Present, summarizes all three CAPAs with deliverables and outcomes. Notes no deviations from remediation plan. VERIFIED.

FORMATTING: Section numbering correct (1-10). Tables consistent. No errors. VERIFIED.

FINDING: COMPLIANT. All post-review requirements met. All CAPA child CRs referenced and confirmed CLOSED per SOP-003 Section 6.3-6.4. Recommend proceeding to post-approval.
